titles.title: A bill to provide for the improvement of domestic infrastructure in order to prevent marine debris, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Barrasso with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 224.
